line.comment: * 50. This is the raw starting amount of points.
* 89% = This is a 0.89% research modifier for the System.
* Points you get from the base research rate
* MordanB - small bonus to terrans because they are disadvantaged in that they only get origin bonus if they research
* Terran ships, but have the restriction they can only do so in terran memory system. No other race has this limitation.
* 44.5 * 50 / 100 = 22.25 (which is 50% above the base research, which is what it should be)
* MordanB - Docked ship of same as research type, gets you a bonus to research.
* See if a docked ship is of the type that we are trying to research
* Add-Ons 1.4.15: Moved here - doing it before the if $currentproject condition was causing a null condition and thus no bonus research from docked ship.
* Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode reduces bonus research to 1.5x as much (25% less research than usual).

* Overflow if we do all the multiplication at once. Need to convert the stacked penalties into percentage (no decimal points) ranging from 0 to 100%. Then, convert that percentage to a decimal and multiply with the building progress factor accordingly.

sval.val: Ускорение исследований
ZH 2.1
50. This is the raw starting amount of points.
89% = This is a 0.89% research modifier for the System.
Points you get from the base research rate
MordanB - small bonus to terrans because they are disadvantaged in that they only get origin bonus if they research
Terran ships, but have the restriction they can only do so in terran memory system. No other race has this limitation.
44.5 * 50 / 100 = 22.25 (which is 50% above the base research, which is what it should be)
Zero Hour 1.10
ZH 2.0
bonus.origin = 3
$bonus.border = 3
MordanB - Docked ship of same as research type, gets you a bonus to research.
See if a docked ship is of the type that we are trying to research
Add-Ons 1.4.15: Moved here - doing it before the if $currentproject condition was causing a null condition and thus no bonus research from docked ship.
$t = 'displayed: ' + $pointsPerCycle + '; docked ship points: ' + $pointsFromDockedShip
write to player logbook $t
Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode reduces bonus research to 1.5x as much (25% less research than usual).
Add-Ons 1.2: Terraforming now penalizes research.

Overflow if we do all the multiplication at once. Need to convert the stacked penalties into percentage (no decimal points) ranging from 0 to 100%. Then, convert that percentage to a decimal and multiply with the building progress factor accordingly.
